title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom Layout/ Furniture Placement", 1934–35
description: Drawing for bedroom, Lady Esther Yacht. Low, box-frame double bed with long cylindrical pillow at head in corner of room. Bed pushed against built-in paneling/cabinet unit at head and on right wall. Three shelves attached to left side of unit, to left of bed. Shelves open on all sides and connected at front by rod. Rounded corners on right side of shelves. Decorative mural or painting above bed and on right wall. Area rug (?) underneath furniture. Rough sketches of furniture in side margins of paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom Layout/ Furniture Placement", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-311.
